body.p:
Maysville April 25 1862
Hon B Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
Dr Sir

I Send you a brief Statement of the trial of young Forman as settled by the Circuit Court at this present sitting -- Signed by the attys and others as young Forman is poor and repents of his error I hope he will meet with that leniency which is characteristic of your Honor and that you will not hesitate to remit the fine imposed upon him
